name: Loopgun
description:
Loopgun is a fast-paced experimental game about shooting and time shifting.
The protagonist finds himself right in the middle of a testing ground, when a voice tells him that something is wrong: the time stabilizer is malfunctioning and, every time he shoots, his weapon releases a residual image that will shoot forever.
Will he survive?
This game is intended to be a vertical slice, a proof-of-concept of some ideas.
We are particularly proud of the graphics and the time-warp system, we hope you enjoy this!

CONTROLS
WASD -  Move the character around
Spacebar - Pick up/ Throw  Objects
Mouse - Look Left Click - Shoot
